backend/main.mo: Defines authorization-backed manufacturing request workflow, user profiles, and approval logic with request creation and approval operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mappings connecting features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of frontend files including hooks, pages, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, authentication gating, profile setup, and layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays a login prompt for unauthenticated users with an Internet Identity sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog collecting a user's name and saving their profile on first login.
frontend/src/components/common/StatePane: Reusable loading, empty, and error UI panels for consistent state display across pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main application layout with navigation, header, footer, and routing outlet, dynamically showing approval links based on user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovals.ts: Fetches approvals for the current user and provides approve/reject mutations with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Exposes authentication state and a logout function that clears identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves and updates the caller’s user profile using the backend actor with query invalidation on save.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequests.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user requests, fetch a single request, submit new requests, and map request statuses to display variants.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/CreateRequestPage.tsx: Form page for submitting a new manufacturing request, handling validation, submission, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MyApprovalsPage.tsx: Displays the current user's pending approvals, handling loading/error states and listing actionable requests in a table.
frontend/src/pages/MyRequestsPage.tsx: Shows all requests created by the user with their statuses, approval progress, and navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/RequestDetailPage.tsx: Loads a specific request, displays its details and status, and allows approvers to approve or reject with comments if authorized.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the app's UI styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the approval workflow app, existing implemented features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes.
